Name: Bloody Mary
Mixes: Tomato Juice	2 dashes salt, 2 dashes pepper, 2 dashes celery salt, 4 drops Worscestershire sauce, 1 drop Tabasco, celery stick or lime garnish

Name: Bloody Maria
Mixes: Tomato Juice	2 dashes salt, 2 dashes pepper, 2 dashes celery salt, 4 drops Worscestershire sauce, 1 drop Tabasco, celery stick or lime garnish
